src:
二次避難受け付け開始　郡山市

01 Nov 2019, 20:00

　
「心身休めてほしい」
台風１９号による避難生活の負担を解消するため、郡山市は１日、近郊のホテルや旅館に一時的に滞在する「二次避難」の受け付けを始めた。１日午前１０時時点で、市内１１か所の避難所には３７７人が避難しているが、１日の申し込みは２件にとどまった。市地域包括ケア推進課の担当者は「避難所生活はストレスがかかる。心身を休めてほしい」と利用を呼びかけている。
　避難所で過ごす世帯などは２泊３日、高齢者や障害者、子供がいる世帯は１週間、食費と宿泊費無料で滞在できる。申し込みを検討している女性（７６）は「避難所は夜もせきの音が響いてうるさい。腰は痛いしクタクタなので、利用して気分を変えたい」と話した。６０歳代男性は「ありがたい取り組みだと思うが、目が悪くて外出もままならない。スタッフのいる避難所のほうが安心だ」と話した。

Secondary evacuation acceptance started Koriyama City

01 Nov 2019, 20:00

*
"I want you to rest yourself"
To alleviate the burden of evacuation life caused by Typhoon No. 19, Koriyama City started accepting “secondary evacuation” to temporarily stay at nearby hotels and inns on the 1st. As of 10:00 am on the 1st, 377 people were evacuated to 11 evacuation centers in the city, but there were only 2 applications for the day. The person in charge of the City Regional Comprehensive Care Promotion Division calls for the use of "shelter life is stressful.
Households staying at evacuation shelters can stay 3 days and 2 nights, and households with the elderly, people with disabilities and children can stay for one week for free for food and accommodation. A woman (76), who is considering applying, said, “The shelter is noisy at night. The waist hurts and I have a pain, so I want to use it to change my mood.” A man in his 60's said, “I think it ’s a good thing to do, but I ’m sick and I ca n’t stay out.
